name: Founder 4
description: Unicorn Boardroom is the NFT collection of rare unicorns who are Founders, Executives, Investors, and Influencers. Pair your Unicorns Boardroom avatars with your purchase from the Unicorn Boardroom Clothing Brand. Unicorns provide you access to exclusive in-person and virtual events, first access to new products, and exclusive discounts from our partner merchants.
